* Schedule a Meet & Greet with the Mayor

Schedule a Meet & Greet with the Mayor
======================================

---

If you would like to schedule a Meet & Greet with Mayor Mapp, Please fill out the form below. Should you have any questions, please contact the Office of the Mayor at 908-753-3310

Edit Form

Meet & Greet Request Form
=========================

Full Name\*

E-mail Address\*

Phone Number\*

Are you a Plainfield resident ?\*

YES

NO

Please provide a brief description regarding the nature of the meeting

![share icon](https://www.plainfieldnj.gov/_assets_/images/share-icon.png)

×
